name: Hotter Elisabeth
description: Our house is situated only a 3 minute walk from both lift stations.
Price excludes a final cleaning charge.

Directions: Mayrhofen - Einfahrt Mitte - to the junction with the high street, turn right and drive up the high street until the Gasthof Brücke, turn left here into the Ahornstrasse, we are the fourth house on the left.

makesOffer.name: Apartment, shower, toilet, 2 bed rooms
makesOffer.description: The apartment has a pleasant lounge with an integrated kitchen. Two separate bedrooms, one with a double bed and the other with 2 singles. Shower and separate WC. Self contained and situated on the 2nd floor. Each room has its own balcony.
